channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Better, Faster, Cheaper Mortgages Could Be On the Way w/Major Finance CEO
item.description: The mortgage industry has just been through one of its biggest booms and busts, but some tech-first, cost-saving innovations could improve things for borrowers after this current cycle. During the […]

item.title: TechCrunch Minute: How to protect yourself from AI scams
item.description: You probably like to think of yourself as reasonably sophisticated when it comes to online scams — you’re not opening random email attachments or sending money to Nigerian princes. But of course, scams evolve with new technology. AI makes it even easier to perform these attacks at scale, while introducing a little personalization that makes […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Love Beyond Bars: Miguel and Silvia
item.description: While Miguel Solorio did 25 years for a crime he didn’t commit, his wife, Silvia, was right by his side. Here’s their California love story in pictures.

item.title: Pay Off Student Loans or Invest in Real Estate: Which Makes You Wealthier?
item.description: Should you pay off student loans or invest in real estate? This is the question Tom Keating had to ask himself back in 2018. At the time, he had no […]

item.title: Tembo capitalizes on the database boom and lands new cash to expand
item.description: One of the vendors to benefit from the database boom is Tembo, a startup creating a platform that lets developers deploy different flavors of Postgres. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Crime Rates and the 2024 Election: What You Need to Know
item.description: As crime data again becomes a flashpoint in the presidential campaign, experts push for better national statistics.

item.title: The Investing “Map” You NEED to Uncover Hot Markets, Neighborhoods, & Deals
item.description: Harnessing the power of data gives you an enormous advantage in your real estate investing journey, allowing you to discover up-and-coming markets or find deals that are flying under the […]

item.title: Mayfield’s Navin Chaddha is coming to TechCrunch Disrupt 2024
item.description: TechCrunch Disrupt 2024 is set to welcome an impressive lineup of judges for the Startup Battlefield 200 competition, presented this year by Google Cloud. These judges will decide which company will win the coveted Disrupt Cup and $100,000 prize. We’re pleased to announce that Navin Chaddha, the managing partner of Mayfield Fund, will be joining […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: A Death Row Prisoner’s Parting Interview
item.description: Days before his scheduled execution in Texas, Ramiro Gonzales speaks on faith, legacy — and apologizing to the family of his victim, Bridget Townsend.

item.title: 4 Tips for Managing Long-Distance Turnkey Rentals Without Cutting Corners
item.description: Taking the easy way out is generally bad practice. Manage your long-distance rentals this way instead.

item.title: Art therapy app Scribble Journey lets you express emotions through doodles
item.description: Numerous concerns are weighing on the minds of many, whether it’s current global conflicts, climate change or the precarious state of the economy, it is no surprise that the world is grappling with a mental health crisis. Some users have turned to apps to cope with mental health struggles. According to data by Grand View […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: The New Battle Over an Old Institution: Forced Prison Labor
item.description: Inside the latest legal and legislative efforts to close state constitutional loopholes that allow slavery as punishment for a crime.

item.title: High-End Homes Hit Peak Prices as Luxury Investors Scramble for Better Deals
item.description: Luxury home prices have made these properties even more unaffordable, but we talked to investors who told us what to look for.

item.title: Pestle’s app can now save recipes from Reels using on-device AI
item.description: Pestle addresses the common problem of finding recipes on the web. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Mississippi Wants to Allow Some Votes From Jails and Prisons. Red Tape May Stop It.
item.description: A new state law will allow more people in jails and prisons to cast absentee ballots, but many obstacles remain.
